fields.name: Holt-Laury

fields.name: Wait

fields.html:
{% load verbatim %}
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html ng-app="Redwood">
	<head>
		<title>Start</title>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/bootstrap/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/angular/angular-1.2.16.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodCore.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodHelpers.js"></script>
	  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodSubject.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-holt-laury/pie.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-holt-laury/start.js"></script>
    <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/css/bootstrap.min.css">
		<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-holt-laury/start.css">
	</head>
  <body ng-include="'/static/experiments/redwood-holt-laury/start.html'"></body>

</html>
fields.name: Start

fields.html:

fields.name: Finish
